Walking: Walking is a simple and healthy way to move around. It allows you to explore your surroundings at a leisurely pace and get some exercise.
Public Transportation: If public transportation is available, it can be a convenient and cost-effective way to move around.
Electric Scooters: Electric scooters are a fun and convenient way to move around short distances. They are easy to park and can be a great alternative to walking.
Skateboarding: Skateboarding is a fun and active way to move around. It can be a great way to explore your town or city and get some exercise.
Carpooling: Carpooling is a great way to move around with friends or family. It can be a fun and social way to travel and reduce traffic congestion.
